showcase.title: The Dark Knight Rises... In CSS
showcase.description: The Dark Knight, a pure CSS art created for fun. It is a simple and fun project to create Batman face using CSS.

showcase.title: CSS Art | Baby Girl | Crying
showcase.description: A cooing little baby girl. It is a pure CSS art created for fun.

showcase.title: CSS Art | One Piece | Jolly Roger
showcase.description: I just love One Piece anime. So, I created Luffy's Jolly Roger using pure CSS.

showcase.title: CSS Art | Moustache | Single Div
showcase.description: A moustache created using a single div element. It is inspired from the awesome work done by Lynn Fisher. Do check out her work.

showcase.title: CSS Art | Office Girl
showcase.description: A portrait of a professional looking girl made purely in CSS. A wall-sized poster in one of my previous offices inspired me to create this.

showcase.title: CSS Art | One Punch Man | Saitama
showcase.description: Saitama is the main protagonist of the anime and manga, One Punch Man. I loved the overall idea of this character so I created this using pure CSS.

showcase.title: CSS Art | Merry Christmas | Santa with Deer
showcase.description: Christmas has a very special vibe for everyone across the globe. I enjoyed this vibe by creating a CSS art of Santa with Deer.

showcase.title: Driver Salary Slip Generator
showcase.description: A simple web app to generate salary slips for drivers. I was looking for such tool myself but without any paywall or ads. So, I created one.

showcase.title: Fun Javascript Game | Space Runner
showcase.description: A fun game created using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. It is a simple endless running game where you have to dodge the space obstacles and move as far as possible, much like Flappy Bird.

showcase.title: Useful VS Code Snippets
showcase.description: A collection of useful VS Code snippets that I use in my day-to-day coding. It includes snippets for HTML, CSS, JS, React, and more.

showcase.title: Chrome Dev Tools Snippets Collection
showcase.description: A collection of useful Chrome Dev Tools snippets that I use in my day-to-day coding. It includes snippets for debugging, performance, and more.

showcase.title: Useful SCSS Mixins
showcase.description: A collection of useful SCSS mixins that I use in my day-to-day coding. It includes mixins for animations, transitions, and more.
